Articles.Content:
when I right click on the experiment storage unit a dark window pops up that only has "new text" and "group name" on it, then it vanishes, I can not right click on anything else, and either the stock toolbar buttons get cloned up or with mechjeb installed it clones so many mechjeb icons it makes the game too laggy to be playable
